product_name: The North Face Isotherm WS Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Isotherm WS jacket for men uses GORE WINDSTOPPER(R) fabric with FlashDry(TM) fibers in the side panels to regulate your temperature while Nordic skiing in cold weather. Windproof fabric protects your core and shoulders from the wind and cold without sacrificing breathability and mobility. Underarm and rear panels with moisture-wicking, quick-drying FlashDry fibers draw moisture away from skin to keep you more comfortable when working hard in cold weather. Fabric mapping delivers optimum temperature regulation in gender-specific thermal zones to keep you more comfortable during long-distance Nordic ski sessions. Reflective taping can be seen from any angle. Thumholes; secure rear pocket; shaped hem; reflective logos. Athlete tested and competition proven, The North Face Isotherm WS jacket for men is part of the Flight Series(R) collection.
short_description: The North Face Isotherm WS jacket for men uses GORE WINDSTOPPER(R) fabric with FlashDry(TM) fibers in the side panels to regulate your temperature while Nordic skiing in cold weather.
